attributes.name: OIC - Gretzky Hour March 2026
attributes.description: OIC - Gretzky HourFull Hockey Gear Required Each player is required to check in at the front desk before each session and must wear their sticker receipt visible on their pants. Full USA Hockey Certified equipment is required. Limit 40 skaters and 4 goalies. Program Fee: $21 per session Players and Goalies must pay the full fee per session. No outside or private coaches are allowed on the ice at any time. - Unless approved through management.
